message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The dilated small bowel with a transition point to normal caliber bowel distally suggests small bowel obstruction, which can be caused by adhesions from previous abdominal surgeries. The recent dental work and use of narcotic pain medicine could have exacerbated the constipation and contributed to the development of the obstruction, but the underlying cause started 20 years ago.
